ModMetaData.name: Better Pawn Control Synchronizer
ModMetaData.author: hawqeye19
ModMetaData.description:
Automatically applies Better Pawn Control (BPC) policies across all supported tabs: Work, Schedule, Assign, Animals, Weapons, Mechs, and Robots, based on matching policy labels.
• Syncs policies instantly when switching or loading maps • Adds a sync button to the Play Settings menu • Displays the active policy label directly in each tab • Supports “UI Not Included” mod (Optional)
Requires Better Pawn Control and Harmony.
